trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取和管理同處理序語音辨識引擎的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以針對任何已安裝的語音辨識器中建立此類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得辨識器已安裝相關的資訊，請使用靜態<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別適用於執行語音辨識引擎同處理序，並提供語音辨識的各個層面的控制，如下所示:-若要建立同處理序語音辨識器，使用其中一種<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -若要管理 語音辨識文法，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>方法，而<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要設定辨識器的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要執行語音辨識，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -若要修改辨識如何處理無回應或非預期的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -若要變更辨識器傳回的替代項目數目，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器傳回辨識導致<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要變更同步至辨識器，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器會使用多個執行緒執行工作。

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -若要模擬的辨識器的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognitionEngine 物件是唯一使用的物件具現化的程序。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>共用單一的辨識器與任何應用程式想要使用它。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>釋放語音辨識器您最後一個參考之前。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫辨識器物件的直到`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>類別使用系統預設的語音辨識器。

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器開始語音辨識之前，您必須至少一個辨識文法載入及設定辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入的文法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的音訊的輸入，使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>類別指定的地區設定使用預設的語音辨識器。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼。

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行使用中所指定語言的語音辨識`CultureInfo`引數，語音辨識引擎支援，必須安裝語言國家/地區的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Microsoft Windows 7 的語音辨識引擎會使用下列語言的國家/地區碼。

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en GB。

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: 英文 （英國）-EN-US。

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: 英文 （美國）-DE-DE。

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: 德文 （德國）-ES-ES。

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: 西班牙文 （西班牙）-fr-fr。

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: 法文 （法國）-JA-JP。

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: 日文 （日本）-ZH-CN。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: 中文 （中國）-ZH-TW。

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 中文 （台灣） 的兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en"、"fr"或"es"也允許使用。

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器開始辨識之前，您必須至少一個語音辨識文法載入及設定辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入的文法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的音訊的輸入，使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器必須支援的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何已安裝的語音辨識器支援指定的地區設定，或 culture 是文化特性而異。

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>使用中的資訊<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref>物件，以指定要使用的辨識器。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以針對任何已安裝的語音辨識器中建立此類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得辨識器已安裝相關的資訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器開始辨識之前，您必須至少一個語音辨識文法載入及設定辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入的文法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的音訊的輸入，使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 特定的語音辨識器的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>類別指定名稱的辨識器使用的字串參數。

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器的語彙基元名稱是值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>所傳回物件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>辨識器的屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get a collection of all the installed recognizers, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得所有已安裝的辨識器的集合，使用靜態<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器開始辨識之前，您必須至少一個語音辨識文法載入及設定辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入的文法，呼叫<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的音訊的輸入，使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用語音辨識器語彙基元的名稱。

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 已安裝任何語音辨識器，具有該語彙基元名稱，或 recognizerId 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得所接收的音訊格式<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的音訊的輸入，使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: 在要輸入的音訊格式<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>執行個體，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果未設定輸入或設為 null 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得所接收的音訊的層級<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: 值 0 代表無回應，而 100 表示最大輸入磁碟區。

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: 音訊的層級的語音辨識器中，輸入 0 到 100 之間。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>報告其音訊的輸入層級。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引發此事件每秒多次。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 用來引發事件的頻率取決於應用程式執行所在的電腦。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的音訊的層級事件時，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>屬性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前音訊的辨識器的輸入層級，使用的辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 AudioLevelUpdated 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供輸入到之裝置所產生的音訊資料流中的目前位置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: AudioPosition 屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性會參考其音訊的輸入中的辨識器的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 這些位置可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果辨識器已接收輸入它具有不尚未產生辨識結果，則值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>屬性小於 AudioPosition 屬性的值。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: 音訊輸入裝置所產生的資料流中目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>音訊訊號中偵測到的問題。

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得哪些問題發生，請使用 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>屬性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 AudioSignalProblemOccurred 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得所接收的音訊狀態<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: AudioState 屬性代表音訊的成員狀態<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 音訊輸入語音辨識器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當接收音訊中的狀態變更時引發<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的音訊狀態事件時，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>屬性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得辨識器的輸入音訊的目前狀態，請使用 辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需音訊狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>列舉型別。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 AudioStateChanged 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間間隔期間<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>接受輸入包含只有背景噪音之前完成辨識。

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: 每個語音辨識器的演算法來區別無回應及語音。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器將分類為任何非無回應輸入不符合任何的辨識器初始規則背景噪音載入，而且啟用語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器收到 babble 逾時間隔內時，只有背景噪音，無回應，辨識器完成該辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -若為非同步辨識作業引發辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>事件，其中<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`true`，而<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -若為同步的辨識作業和模擬，辨識器傳回`null`，而不是有效的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器 babble 逾時期限設為 0 時，不會執行 babble 逾時核取。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔可以是任何非負數的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為小於 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 處置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 處置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>工作階段期間使用的物件，並釋放資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 模擬片語的語音辨識器，使用同步的語音辨識的文字取代音訊的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件如同辨識作業不模擬。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Vista 和 Windows 7 的辨識器忽略大小寫，並將文法規則套用至輸入的片語時，字元寬度。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這種類型的比較的詳細資訊，請參閱的<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>列舉值<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>和<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器也會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 輸入辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 辨識作業的結果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果作業未順利完成，或未啟用辨識器。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器已經載入任何語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputText為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 模擬特定單字的語音辨識器，使用同步的語音辨識的文字取代音訊的輸入，並指定辨識器如何處理之間的單字與載入的語音辨識文法的 Unicode 比較。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件如同辨識作業不模擬。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識器`compareOptions`套用文法規則進行剖析的輸入句子。

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: 隨附於 Vista 和 Windows 7 的辨識器會忽略大小寫，如果<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>或<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>值存在於。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器永遠會忽略字元寬度，並永遠不會忽略假名類型。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器也會忽略新行和額外的空白字元和標點符號視為常值的輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需全半形字元和假名類型的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>列舉型別。</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Word 單位的陣列，其中包含將辨識作業的輸入。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 描述要用於模擬的辨識作業的比較類型的列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 辨識作業的結果或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果作業未順利完成，或未啟用辨識器。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.

trans-unit.target: compareOptions包含， ，或旗標。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation of emulated input.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>完成非同步的辨識作業的模擬的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法開始非同步的辨識作業。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>後，引發 EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件它結束非同步作業。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>作業可能會引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件是最後一個這類辨識器引發對指定作業的事件。

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was successful, you can access the recognition result using the either of the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object in the handler for the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: 如果模擬的辨識成功，您可以存取辨識結果，使用下列任一項:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>中的屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>EmulateRecognizeCompleted 事件的處理常式中的物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>物件中的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event is not raised and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有成功，模擬的辨識<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>不會引發事件和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>將會是 null。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>衍生自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you create an EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 EmulateRecognizeCompleted 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of unambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的無回應間隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>之前完成辨識作業將會接受結尾的模稜兩可的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is unambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器辨識輸入模稜兩可時，會使用此逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如支援的其中一個辨識語音辨識文法 」 新遊戲請 」 或 「 新的遊戲，「 」 新遊戲請 」 是模稜兩可的輸入，而 「 新遊戲"模稜兩可的輸入。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定多久語音辨識引擎會等候對其他輸入正在辨識作業完成。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔可以是 10 秒，內含從 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The default is 150 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 150 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for ambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的逾時間隔模稜兩可的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 無回應間隔的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為小於 0 秒，或大於 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of ambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的無回應間隔<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>之前完成辨識作業將會接受結尾的模稜兩可的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 辨識輸入模稜兩可時，語音辨識器就會使用此逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: 例如支援的其中一個辨識語音辨識文法 」 新遊戲請 」 或 「 新的遊戲，「 」 新遊戲請 」 是模稜兩可的輸入，而 「 新遊戲"模稜兩可的輸入。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定多久語音辨識引擎會等候對其他輸入正在辨識作業完成。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔可以是 10 秒，內含從 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The default is 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 500 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for unambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的逾時間隔模稜兩可的輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 無回應間隔的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為小於 0 秒，或大於 10 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件載入這個<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間間隔期間<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>接受輸入包含只有無回應之前完成辨識。

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: 每個語音辨識器的演算法來區別無回應及語音。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer input is silence during the initial silence timeout period, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器輸入初始無回應逾時期間是無回應，辨識器完成該辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -若為非同步辨識作業和模擬，辨識器引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>事件，其中<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`true`，而<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -若為同步的辨識作業和模擬，辨識器傳回`null`，而不是有效的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If the initial silence timeout interval is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform an initial silence timeout check.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始的無回應的逾時間隔設定為 0 時，辨識器不會執行初始無回應逾時核取。

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔可以是任何非負數的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: 無回應間隔的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為小於 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: Returns information for all of the installed speech recognizers on the current system.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的系統上所有已安裝的語音辨識器的資訊。

trans-unit.source: To get information about the current recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前的辨識器的相關資訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> objects that describe the installed recognizers.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀集合<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref>物件會描述已安裝的辨識器。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously loads a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式載入<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件已經載入，以非同步方式載入，或無法載入任何辨識器。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法載入相同的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件至多個執行個體的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: 請改為建立新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件給每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入文法時，預設會啟用它。

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用已載入的文法，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要載入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件以非同步方式，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的文法物件。

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: Grammar is not in a valid state.
trans-unit.target: Grammar不是處於有效狀態。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式載入語音辨識文法。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器完成載入時<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件時，便會產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件已經載入，以非同步方式載入，或無法載入任何辨識器。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法載入相同的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件至多個執行個體的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: 請改為建立新<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件給每個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 當您載入文法時，預設會啟用它。

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用已載入的文法，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式載入語音辨識文法，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識文法載入。

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: Grammar is not in a valid state.
trans-unit.target: Grammar不是處於有效狀態。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous operation was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finishes the asynchronous loading of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>完成非同步載入<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>方法啟始非同步作業。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引發這個事件時完成作業。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件，辨識器載入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>屬性</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>辨識器載入之後，物件會使用的辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停之前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用文法的語音辨識引擎。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a LoadGrammarCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 LoadGrammarCompleted 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定替代的辨識結果數目上限<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>為每個辨識作業傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent possible interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>類別包含的集合<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>代表可能的解譯，輸入的物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates 的預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: The number of alternate results to return.
trans-unit.target: 替代要傳回的結果數目。

trans-unit.source: MaxAlternates is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates 設定為小於 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of settings for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回辨識器設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器設定可以包含字串、 64 位元整數或記憶體位址資料。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述會定義 Microsoft 語音 API (SAPI) 的設定為相容的辨識器。

trans-unit.source: The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting.
trans-unit.target: 下列設定的支援設定每個辨識器必須在相同的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings.
trans-unit.target: SAPI 相容的辨識器不需要支援這些設定，而且可支援其他設定。

trans-unit.source: |Name|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption.
trans-unit.target: |名稱 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|指定的辨識器 CPU 耗用量。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: 範圍是從 0 到 100 之間。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 50。 | |`ResponseSpeed`|語音辨識器完成辨識作業之前，請指出無回應的模稜兩可的輸入結尾的長度。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms).
trans-unit.target: 範圍是從 0 到 10000 毫秒 (ms)。

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此設定會對應至辨識器的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 = 150ms年。 | |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|語音辨識器完成辨識作業之前，請指出無回應的模稜兩可的輸入結尾的長度。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000ms.
This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此設定會對應至辨識器的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`).
trans-unit.target: 預設值 = 500 毫秒。 | |`AdaptationOn`|指出的柔和式模型適應是否為 ON (值 = `1`) 或 OFF (值 = `0`)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`1`(ON)。 | |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|指出背景適應是否為 ON (值 = `1`) 或 OFF (值 = `0`)，並將保存在登錄中的設定。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| To update a setting for the recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: Terminates asynchronous recognition without waiting for the current recognition operation to complete.

trans-unit.source: This method immediately finalizes asynchronous recognition.
