trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the input is truncated and the operation completes with the existing input.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的非同步辨識作業會接收輸入，輸入會截斷，並在作業完成的現有輸入。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is canceled, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件時的非同步作業已取消，並設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>至`true`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method cancels asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會取消非同步作業所起始<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop asynchronous recognition without truncating the input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止非同步辨識，而不截斷輸入，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops asynchronous recognition after the current recognition operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的辨識作業完成之後，就會停止非同步辨識。

trans-unit.source: This method finalizes asynchronous recognition without truncating input.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不截斷輸入完成非同步的辨識。

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the recognizer continues accepting input until the current recognition operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的非同步辨識作業接收輸入，辨識器會繼續接受輸入，直到目前的辨識作業完成。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is stopped, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>事件時的非同步作業已停止，並設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>至`true`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method stops asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會停止非同步作業所起始<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To immediately cancel asynchronous recognition with only the existing input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要立即取消非同步辨識與現有的輸入，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>完成非同步的辨識作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>物件的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>方法啟始非同步辨識作業。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer finalizes the asynchronous operation, it raises this event.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器結束非同步作業時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the handler for the RecognizeCompleted event, you can access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RecognizeCompleted 事件處理常式，您可以存取<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>中<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有成功，辨識<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>將`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a timeout or an interruption in audio input caused recognition to fail, you can access the properties for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷逾時或音訊輸入中斷造成失敗的辨識，您可以存取的屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>，或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>類別，如需詳細資訊。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To obtain details on the best rejected recognition candidates, attach a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得最佳的拒絕的辨識候選項的詳細資訊，請將附加的處理常式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 RecognizeCompleted 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的位置<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>音訊輸入它正在處理中。

trans-unit.source: The audio position is specific to each speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 音訊位置會因每個語音辨識器。

trans-unit.source: The zero value of an input stream is established when it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，會建立輸入資料流的零值。

trans-unit.source: The RecognizerAudioPosition property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: RecognizerAudioPosition 屬性參考<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>其音訊的輸入中的物件的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 這些位置可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果辨識器已接收輸入它具有不又 RecognizerAudioPosition 屬性的值小於的值，然後產生辨識結果<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: 音訊輸入它正在處理中的辨識器位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的執行個體的相關資訊<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To get information about all of the installed speech recognizers for the current system, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前系統的所有已安裝的語音辨識器的相關資訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the current speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 目前的語音辨識器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a running <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> pauses to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: 當執行時，引發<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>接受修改的暫停時間。

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> before modifying its settings or its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停的執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>之前修改其設定或其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引發這個事件時就準備好接受修改。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，雖然<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>會暫停，您可以載入、 卸載、 啟用和停用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件，並修改值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizerUpdateReached delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 RecognizerUpdateReached 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器暫停更新其狀態的要求。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>是`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供使用者語彙基元，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 要求辨識器以更新其狀態會暫停，並提供使用者 token 相關聯的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`參數。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的音訊位置的位移，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的資訊，其中包含作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 要求辨識器以更新其狀態會暫停，並提供相關聯的事件的位移和使用者 token。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器不會啟動辨識器更新要求，直到辨識器<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>等於目前<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>加上`audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器產生<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>事件，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>包含值的`userToken`參數。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的資訊，其中包含作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: 從目前的位移<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>延遲要求。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>可接收輸入音訊資料流中的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器到達輸入資料流結尾辨識作業期間，辨識作業完成與可用的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 任何後續的辨識作業會產生例外狀況，除非您更新辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: 音訊的輸入資料流。

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: 音訊輸入的格式。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>可從預設音訊裝置接收輸入物件。

trans-unit.source: Disables the input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 停用 語音辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Configure the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object for no input when using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods, or when taking a recognition engine temporarily off line.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>物件使用時沒有輸入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法，或取得辨識引擎暫時離線時。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a Waveform audio format (.wav) file.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>可接收輸入波形音訊 (.wav) 的格式檔案中的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input file during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器到達輸入的檔案結尾辨識作業期間，辨識作業完成與可用的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 任何後續的辨識作業會產生例外狀況，除非您更新辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to use as input.
trans-unit.target: 要做為輸入使用的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a stream that contains Waveform audio format (.wav) data.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>来接收來自包含波形音訊 (.wav) 的格式資料的資料流的輸入物件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器到達輸入資料流結尾辨識作業期間，辨識作業完成與可用的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 任何後續的辨識作業會產生例外狀況，除非您更新辨識器的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 包含音訊資料流。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>偵測到它可以將它識別為語音的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: 每個語音辨識器的演算法來區別無回應及語音。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> performs a speech recognition operation, it raises the SpeechDetected event when its algorithm identifies the input as speech.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行語音辨識作業，便會產生其演算法識別為語音輸入時 SpeechDetected 事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>物件可指出辨識器偵測到語音輸入資料流中的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the SpeechDetected event before it raises any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>引發 SpeechDetected 事件才會產生任何<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>，或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechDetected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 SpeechDetected 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>已辨識的單字或可能是元件的文法中的多個完整片語的單字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> generates numerous SpeechHypothesized events as it attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>會產生許多 SpeechHypothesized 事件，因為它嘗試識別輸入的片語。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can access the text of partially recognized phrases in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the SpeechHypothesized event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取的部分已辨識片語中的文字<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>SpeechHypothesized 事件的處理常式中的物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，處理這些事件是只用於偵錯。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>衍生自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechHypothesized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 SpeechHypothesized 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that does not match any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>收到不符合它的所有載入及啟用的輸入<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 辨識器引發這個事件，如果它決定輸入不符合足夠放心地它的所有載入及啟用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含拒絕<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the handler for the SpeechRecognitionRejected event to retrieve recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> that were rejected and their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> scores.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SpeechRecognitionRejected 事件的處理常式來擷取辨識<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>而遭到拒絕，且其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>分數。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體，您可以修改信心層級上的語音，輸入已接受或拒絕使用其中一個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改非語音輸入使用語音辨識的回應方式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognitionRejected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 SpeechRecognitionRejected 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that matches any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>接收符合它的所有載入及啟用輸入<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can initiate a recognition operation using the one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個辨識作業來起始<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the SpeechRecognized event if it determines that input matches one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects with a sufficient level of confidence to constitute recognition.
trans-unit.target: 如果它決定輸入符合其載入其中一個動作，辨識器引發 SpeechRecognized 事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>足夠構成辨識信心層級的物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>包含接受<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handlers of SpeechRecognized events can obtain the recognized phrase as well as a list of recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> with lower confidence scores.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognized 事件處理常式可以取得已辨識的片語，以及一份辨識<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>使用較低的信心分數。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體，您可以修改信心層級上的語音，輸入已接受或拒絕使用其中一個<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改非語音輸入使用語音辨識的回應方式<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 當辨識器收到符合文法中，輸入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件可以引發其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>語音辨識器 SpeechRecognized 事件之前引發事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be performed by a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: 任何特定的文法特定的工作應該一律執行的處理常式所<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 SpeechRecognized 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件和委派](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Unloads all <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects from the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 卸載所有<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>辨識器從物件。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> asynchronously, this method waits until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> is loaded, before it unloads all of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器目前正在載入<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>以非同步的方式，這個方法會等到<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>載入時之前它會卸載所有,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件從<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>執行個體。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸除特定文法，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 卸載指定<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>物件從<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果辨識器正在執行，應用程式必須使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>暫停<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>前載入、 卸載、 啟用，或停用執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要卸載所有<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>物件，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to unload.
trans-unit.target: 要卸載的文法物件。

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: The grammar is not loaded in this recognizer, or this recognizer is currently loading the grammar asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 文法未載入至此辨識器，或此辨識器正在以非同步方式載入的文法。

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified setting for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> with the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: 更新指定的設定，如<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>與指定的整數值。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: 除了`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`，使用 UpdateRecognizerSetting 方法設定的屬性值僅針對目前的執行個體仍然有效<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>之後將它們還原為其預設設定,。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>如需支援設定的描述。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>
